title: Mud Balls!
description: In Mud Balls!, two children take the reader through the steps to create mud balls. This informational book uses a familiar subject to make functional writing interesting for students. The text also affords opportunities to teach about author's purpose, capitalization, and other reading skills.
reviewWords: dry, mix, mud, sand, scoop, shape
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds                : Discriminate initial and final consonant /s/ sound
phonics: Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Ss
wordWork: Concept Words                : Recognize and use position words
